title: Total electric flux as nearby charge moves closer

content.prompt: Conductor Y is then moved closer to conductor X until it is just outside a closed cubical surface containing conductor X, as shown in the figure above. How would the total electric flux through the cubical surface change as conductor Y is moving?

choices.label: It would remain constant, with the flux through each side of the surface also remaining constant.
It would remain constant, but the flux through each side of the cubical surface would change.
